abstract: Russian Foreign Min Sergey V Lavrov says he will meet with Sec of State John Kerry to discuss rising attacks by extremists in Syria; announcement came after Pres Vladimir V Putin, who has pledged support for fighting against Islamic State, met with Syrian Foreign Min Walid al-Moallem.
lead_paragraph: Russia’s foreign minister said Monday that he would meet Tuesday with Secretary of State John Kerry to discuss the crisis in Syria and rising attacks by extremists.

headline.main: Russia: Officials Meet on Syrian Crisis
headline.print_headline: Europe; Russia: Officials Meet on Syrian Crisis

snippet: Russia’s foreign minister said Monday that he would meet Tuesday with Secretary of State John Kerry to discuss the crisis in Syria and rising attacks by extremists.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
